findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enables cross-origin requests to access sensitive WordPress API endpoints, potentially exposing user data or allowing unauthorized actions.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain 2. Make XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials 3. Access response data that should be restricted 4. Potentially enumerate other WordPress API endpoints for more sensitive data or actions
